links.description: Like the actors in Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, NSYNC appear as toys in their music video for ‘Bye Bye Bye’. As dancing marionettes, they’re manipulated by a puppeteer, who begins to cut their strings.

links.description: A young Jim Henson admired ventriloquist Edgar Bergen, a radio star who went on to appear in film and TV with his “dummy”, Charlie McCarthy. The duo appeared on The Muppet Show and made their final appearance in The Muppet Movie.

links.description: While Charlie McCarthy was cheeky but benign, the dummy Hugo in Dead of Night (1945) is murderous. The horrific scene where the ventriloquist dummy strangles a character paved the way for many more malevolent onscreen dummies and puppets.
